title: Howling Blog
subtitle: Next.js and MongoDB
description:
A personal blog written from scratch using Next.js and MongoDB for the database. Also comes with editor dashboard.
Talks about things I do on programming and sometimes my hobbies.
You may find something interesting from the perspective of a former-college student inside...

title: Izuna Discord Bot
subtitle: Fastify, discord.js, Sapphire Framework
description: A Discord Bot to fulfils my daily hobby activities. Able to play music, query some information from VNDB.org, assign custom emoji-like tags, and other fun activities.

title: Youtube to MP3 Online Converter
subtitle: React, Node.js, Express.js
description: A simple application to download and convert Youtube videos into MP3 on server using Node.js. Client-server communication done through Websocket.
